Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE ABUSE

Title: Directs the commissioner of the office of addiction services and supports to promulgate rules and regulations for providers operating in rural locations
Summary: Directs the commissioner of the office of addiction services and supports to promulgate rules and regulations for providers operating in rural locations while taking into account the extra challenges encountered by such providers, including but not limited to, increased and additional expenses.
LawCode: Amd ยง19.09, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to directing the commissioner of the office of addiction services and supports to promulgate rules and regulations for providers operating in rural locations
